description: Hundreds of people attend wreath laying ceremonies at war memorials across the Isle of Man.
title: Remembrance Sunday: Crowds on Isle of Man fall silent
title_page: Remembrance Sunday: Crowds on Isle of Man fall silent - BBC News
maintext: Archdeacon Ven Andrew Brown said the gathering was "not only about remembering those who have fallen", but also "to learn to be better as nations, as communities and as individuals, that we determine we will work for peace".
